self_predictions.prediction_summary: Ermes believes he can beat Jerry even at 85% of his best shape. He thinks his current form is sufficient to win.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Ermes plans to take Jerry's wrist and use his strength to dominate.

self_predictions.prediction_summary: Ermes admits it's very difficult and he's not as confident with his left arm. He thinks Morozov has a higher chance.

Artyom Morozov.previous_match_summary: Noted Morozov's performance in previous matches.
